input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: SĘPOLNO KRAJEŃSKIE COMMUNE. Summary: Organizing and Managing the Paid Parking Zone in Sępolno Krajeńskie. Description: 1. The subject of the order is the service of organizing, equipping and administering Paid Parking Zones in Splno Krajeski. The contractor is obliged to launch the Paid Parking Zone within 30 days from the date of signing the contract. The rules for the operation of the Paid Parking Zone have been changed specified in Resolution No. XIX/154/2025 of the City Council in Splno Krajeski of September 24, 2025 on determining the paid parking zone and the amount of vehicle parking fees and the method of collecting these fees (Journal of Laws of the Kuj. Pom. Province, item 4384 of October 1, 2025). The Ordering Party allows changes to the applicable resolution, which may not give rise to the Contractor's claims against the Ordering Party, and an increase in the Contractor's remuneration. The Paid Parking Zone in Splno Krajeski includes the following streets: Plac Wolnoci, Myska, Nowy Rynek, Jeziorna. The estimated number of parking spaces in SPP is 97. Fees will be collected from Monday to Friday from 9.00 a.m. to 5.00 p.m., excluding public holidays. A detailed description of the subject of the order is included in Appendix No. 6 to SWZ.. Published Date: 2025-11-07. Closing Date: 2025-11-18. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: USTRZYKI DOLNE COMMUNE. Summary: Delivery of a "Microbus" Passenger Car Adapted to Transport Disabled People for the Purposes of the Activities of the Community Self-Help Home In Ustrzyki Dolne. Description: The subject of the order is the supply of a 9-seat minibus passenger car, adapted to transport disabled people, for the Community Self-Help Home in Ustrzyki Dolne. As part of the settlement for the implementation of the subject of the contract, the Contractor will be obliged to purchase from the Ordering Party the following car (no accident): FORD Transit Custom 2.0 TDCI 130 HP M6 TREND KOMBI M1 310 L2 Year of production 2017 Body number: WF01XXTTG1HA31603 Body type: KOMBI M1 Number of seats: 9 Manufacturer code: TIHL4TB Fuel type: Diesel Engine capacity: 1995 cm Vehicle card: KP/AAC 5187026 Color: Gray Mileage so far 328,580 km (as of August 31, 2025) average monthly mileage (over 6 months) 3,281 km The valuation of the above car is to be made by the Contractor!!! Summary: Collection and Management of Municipal Waste in the Period from January 1 to December 31, 2026. from Property Owners Living in the City and Commune of Sanniki. The subject of the order does not include the collection and management of municipal waste from uninhabited properties in the commune.<br> Collection and management of municipal waste in the period from January 1 to December 31, 2026. input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: DISTRICT-MUNICIPAL ASSOCIATION OF THE BAY OF PUCK. Summary: Purchase of Two New Zero-Emission Electric Buses for the Needs of the Residents of Puck County.. Description: The subject of the order is the "Purchase of two new zero-emission electric buses for the needs of the inhabitants of Puck County."<br> The order is financed from the funds of the Municipalities and the District and co-financing from EU funds from the National Reconstruction and Resilience Plan, component E Green, intelligent mobility, Investment: E1.1.2 Zero- and low-emission public transport (buses) 2.0<br> The subject of the order is the delivery of 2 pieces of the same, brand new, zero-emission electric buses of class II, category M3. The buses in question must be factory-built new, unused, fully functional, manufactured no earlier than 2025, coming from an official distribution channel in Poland or the European Union, not encumbered with any third-party rights. Buses cannot be displayed at sales points. They must be of the same model/type, the same version, have the same equipment and organization of the passenger space. The components, parts used, solutions and technical parameters must be the same in all buses delivered. The buses are to be delivered with additional equipment, authorization granted, necessary software, documentation and training. The ordering party will consider that a brand new vehicle will also be a vehicle which, due to the need to perform appropriate technical inspections, obtain appropriate approvals and transport to the ordering party, will have .... Tender Value: 5000000. Currency: PLN. Published Date: 2025-11-06. Closing Date: 2025-11-14. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

Description: Frontex is looking for EU Contractors to provide a fully-fledged service with manned fixed wing aircraft for aerial surveillance over sea which includes: a. aircraft; b.sufficient number of crew members (pilot, sensor operator, technician, etc.) in order to be able to deliver minimum 2 flight missions per day without any limitation; c.sufficient number of Liaison officer(s) in the assigned Operation Coordination Centre (Host MS ICC or Frontex HQ) during the entire deployment period, who will be working on the tasks related to the flight from 60 minutes before the moment of a take-off to 60 minutes following the landing; d. maintenance capability; e. data transmission capability via BRLOS (including near real time video streaming of the EO/IR) to the Operation Coordination Centre; f. logistical infrastructure and ground support (e.g. hangar, parking place of the aircraft, fuel, etc.); g. administrative responsibility (management of any permissions related to registration, certification, transportation, deployment, authorizations, insurances, permissions to fly, etc.) to deliver aerial surveillance over the external maritime border of the Host Country; h.the Contractor shall provide the collected data directly from the Asset to the designated Frontex Coordination Centre via BRLOS with a minimum uplink speed of 512 kbps. Summary: Conducting Ongoing Maintenance and Repairs of the Measurement System Located on Roads Managed by the Gddkia Branch in Lublin, Along with Providing Data, over a Period of 18 Months.. Description: The subject of the contract is the ongoing maintenance and repairs of the measurement system located on roads managed by GDDKiA Branch in Lublin, including the provision of data, over a period of 18 months. Comprehensive ongoing maintenance of the measurement system includes activities enabling for uninterrupted operation of the system in accordance with OPZ requirements, including the provision of data recorded by the measurement system devices and data exchange with the Ordering Party's Regional Traffic Management System (RSZR). Maintenance activities include, among others: maintenance and continuous maintenance efficiency and proper technical condition of all elements constituting the measurement system, in particular the technical and software infrastructure, collecting recorded data and performing auxiliary activities, i.e. calibration and verification tests ensuring the achievement of required accuracy of data provided by stations. The maintenance of the measurement system also includes ensuring the collection, exchange and transmission of data to and from measurement stations, as well as all activities related to ensuring the proper functioning of individual station modules, including signs and variable message boards constituting part of the measuring station infrastructure. Maintaining the measurement system also includes repairs to the infrastructure and equipment of the measurement system necessary to maintain proper technical condition and ensure continuity deliver.... Summary: Purchase of a Drinking Water Tanker and a Mobile Water Treatment Plant under the Civil Protection and Civil Defense Program for 2025/2026. Description: Delivery of a PW-1/8 type tanker/wager for transporting drinking water with a capacity of 8,000 liters, single-axle, with 560/60 R22.5 tires. General requirements: 1) The delivered equipment must be brand new, complete, free from defects, unused, manufactured no earlier than in the year of delivery. 2) The tank must meet the requirements applicable provisions of Polish and European Union law, including standards regarding the transport and storage of water intended for human consumption.3) The contractor is obliged to provide, together with the subject of the order: approval certificate, EC declaration of conformity, PZH certificate for materials in contact with with drinking water and operating instructions in Polish.4) The contractor will ensure transport, unloading, commissioning and handing over the equipment for use in the place indicated by the Ordering Party.5) The contractor will provide a warranty for the delivered equipment for a minimum period of 12 months. Required standard equipment: o tank hot-dip galvanized steel, painted on the outside, o upper hose with a diameter of approx. 400 mm, o rear hose with a diameter of approx. 600 mm, o ball valve 2, o plastic fenders, o mechanically adjustable support foot, o replaceable hitch with a diameter of approx. 50 mm, o installation electric.... Description: package no. 1 transport service for students to schools as part of regular transport, monthly tickets. The subject of the order is the provision of transport services for the purpose of transporting and returning students to and from school facilities. It is recommended that the Contractor familiarize himself with the routes before submitting an offer. Carrying out transport services is closely related to the organization of the school year, of which the Contractor is aware when submitting the offer. In package No. 1, care for the students is provided by the Ordering Party (the Contractor does not include the costs of caregivers in the offer price). The Ordering Party reserves the obligation for the Contractor to personally perform key tasks, in accordance with Art. 60 i art. 121 of the Public Procurement Law. By key tasks, the Ordering Party understands the delivery and pick-up of students using rolling stock adapted to public transport services, along with providing a driver and a guardian (on two routes of package no. 2). More information in Chapter 4 of the SWZ, in the printed offer and in the project contracts.. Tender Value: 469975.50. Currency: PLN. Published Date: 2025-11-05. Closing Date: 2025-11-14. The grounds for exclusion from the proceedings are described in Chapter VIII of the SWZ. The declarations and documents that contractors are obliged to provide in order to demonstrate the lack of grounds for exclusion and confirm compliance with the conditions for participation in the proceedings are described in Chapter IX of the SWZ. The conditions for participation in the proceedings are described in Chapter VII of the SWZ. The Contractor will meet the condition if it proves that in the last 3 years before the deadline for submitting offers, and if the period of running a business is shorter - during this period, it has duly delivered at least one special car with a mechanical ladder for an amount not less than than PLN 2,000,000.<br> 40 m<br> Doc Title: Delivery of a special car with a mechanical ladder with a rescue height of min. 40 m<br> Contract Type: supplies. Summary: Delivery of Two Mobile Power Generators for the Needs of Civil Protection and Civil Defense under the Civil Protection and Civil Defense Program for 2025-2026. Description: The subject of the order is the delivery of two brand new, complete, mobile power generators with a rated power of approximately 120 kW (150 kVA) each, along with two two-axle trailers adapted for their transport. The generators will constitute independent three-phase and single-phase power sources, intended for work in the field, especially during outdoor events, rescue operations, crisis situations, construction works and other tasks requiring an independent source of electricity. The order includes: delivery of two complete power generators, delivery of two transport trailers adapted to transport units, assembly and preparation of units for operation, performance of start-up tests and tests under load, training of persons indicated by the Ordering Party in the field of operation and maintenance, provision of technical documentation, operating instructions and warranty cards in English Polish.. The contractor will bear the costs related to securing the works carried out in the road lanes based on the temporary traffic organization. The subject of the order is divided into 16 parts ("Packages"). The Ordering Party provides for the possibility of awarding orders referred to in Art. 214 section 1 point 7) PZP, within 3 years from the date of awarding the basic contract. The drone (UAV) should be able to be assigned a C5 class by the manufacturer or be equipped with a set of accessories transforming it into an UAV class C5, in accordance with Commission Delegated Regulation (EU) 2020/1058 of 27 April 2020 amending Delegated Regulation (EU) 2019/945 as regards the introduction of two new classes of unmanned aircraft systems.3.
